English: *Pant* *Pant*... This is the 16th precinct. It was pretty far away.
It feels... lonely. So different than during the day.
It's a relatively large 2 floor police station. I've never imagined I'd have to go to a place like this...
This must be the police station where Jack's stationed...
I'd never thought I'd have to come to the police for this reason.
We can't just idle here forever. Let's go inside.
There's a room on the second floor where the light's on. The officers on night duty are probably playing poker or something.
Yeah, there's no doubt. It says this is the 16th precinct right here.
The small print is dirty, but it says the station was build more than 30 years ago.
I wonder what goes through suspects' minds when they see this sign as they're brought in.
This entrance is spaceous. It must be pretty large inside too.
The car's in the way so I can't see it too well.
This is a 16th precing patrol car. There's no one in it.
There's no reason to stare at this patrol car so much.
I sometimes see homeless people around this garbage can. It's a police station, so there probably isn't much leftover food in there -- I wonder why they always gather there..
Seems like they're searching for shredded police documents to sell to the mafia. It's a pretty frightening story.
Cole, we don't have time to look at this.
Anyway, let's try talking to the police. I'm sure they'll understand.
Yes... You're right.
Anyway, let's try talking to the police. I'm sure they'll understand.
Yes... You're right.
Anyway, let's try talking to the police. I'm sure they'll understand.
Yes... You're right.
